title: Mikyle Lowe and the Parchment of the Emerald Ring
description: This book is no longer available.Mikyle Lowe is abandoned at infancy and is grown up being hated by his remaining family. He soon finds out that he has magic and is sent to Mystic School of Sorcery, but quickly after unveils the truth of his past, and is told of his destiny that will change his life forever. And that being safe was a gift!
author: M.J.L.
